mapper.select:
select cm.id,mr.userId,mr.contactId,u.nickname as contactName,u.avatar as contactAvatar, cm.content,cm.fileName,cm.fileSize,cm.type,cm.time from User u join MessageRecord mr on mr.contactId = u.id join ChatMessage cm on cm.id = mr.messageId
((mr.userId = #{userId} and mr.contactId = #{contactId} and mr.userSent = 1) or (mr.userId = #{contactId} and mr.contactId = #{userId} and mr.userSent = 0))
mr.userId = #{userId} and mr.contactId = #{contactId}
and mr.userDelete = 0
order by cm.time

select cm.id,mr.userId,mr.contactId,u.nickname as contactName,u.avatar as contactAvatar, cm.content,cm.fileName,cm.filePath,cm.fileSize,cm.type,cm.time from ChatMessage cm join MessageRecord mr on cm.id = mr.messageId join User u on u.id = mr.userId left join GroupMessageRecord gmr on gmr.recordId = mr.id where mr.contactId like 'G%' and mr.contactId = #{groupId} and gmr.memberId = #{userId} order by cm.time

select hm.id as headMessageId,count(1) as unReadCount from HeadMessage hm join MessageRecord mr on mr.userId = hm.userId and mr.contactId = hm.contactId join ChatMessage cm on cm.id = mr.messageId where cm.handled = 0 and hm.userId = #{userId} group by hm.id union select hm.id as headMessageId,count(1) as unReadCount from HeadMessage hm join MessageRecord mr on mr.userId = hm.userId and mr.contactId = hm.contactId join ChatMessage cm on cm.id = mr.messageId left join GroupMessageRecord gmr on gmr.recordId = mr.id where cm.handled = 0 and hm.userId = #{userId} and mr.userId != #{userId} and hm.contactId like 'G%' and mr.userDelete = 0 group by hm.id
